text: Fred McLeod (1952 â€“ September 9, 2019) was an American sportscaster. He was the executive producer of multimedia, and television play-by-play announcer for the Cleveland Cavaliers and the Detroit Pistons of the National Basketball Association (NBA).Cavs media guide - Cavs.com McLeod died on September 9, 2019 at the age of 67.A Very Sad Cavaliers Family Announcement ==Awards== *Three- time Lower Great Lakes Emmy Award recipient as a member of Fox Sports Ohio's Cavaliers broadcast team - 2014, 2017, 20182017 Emmy winners - NATAS Lower Great Lakes Chapter ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American sports commentators Category:Sportspeople from Cleveland
title: Fred McLeod (sportscaster)
